comments.content:
The original posters were hand-lettered, but Mark Simonson has created a beautiful digital version based on this style called Mostra:  
 [http://www.marksimonson.com/fonts/view/mostra-nuova](http://web.archive.org/web/20150320042629/http:/www.marksimonson.com/fonts/view/mostra-nuova "http://www.marksimonson.com/fonts/view/mostra-nuova")

Flat-It’s PAG Smoke is also very similar:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/prop-a-ganda/pag-smoke/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150320042629/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/prop-a-ganda/pag-smoke/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/prop-a-ganda/pag-smoke/")

As is Kobalt:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/kobalt/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150320042629/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/kobalt/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/kobalt/")
Also Eagle has a similar construction of letters (for example |G|N|, etc.), but it’s more normalised overall.
Thank you guys, I really appreciate it!
